name: Jungle Ghost
description:
This is a tiny and funny two-player chasing game. Play with your best friend and see who would survive to the end!

Ghost: W for jump, A and D for moving left and right.  Catch the soldier three times before your health runs out!

Soldier: ↑ for jump, ←→ for moving left and right, mouse for aiming, left mouse button for firing. Shoot at the Ghost and survive until he dies!

Feel free to leave any comments! Have fun :)
